speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Brother
              ,
               
              goodnight
              .
               
              Tomorrow
               
              is
               
              the
               
              day
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              SOLDIER
text:
It
               
              will
               
              determine
               
              one
               
              way
              .
               
              Fare
               
              you
               
              well
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Heard
               
              you
               
              of
               
              nothing
               
              strange
               
              about
               
              the
               
              streets
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Belike
               
              ’tis
               
              but
               
              a
               
              rumor
              .
               
              Goodnight
               
              to
               
              you
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Our
               
              navy
               
              thrive
              ,
               
              I
               
              have
               
              an
               
              absolute
               
              hope

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
’Tis
               
              a
               
              brave
               
              army
              ,
               
              and
               
              full
               
              of
               
              purpose
              .

speaker:
FOURTH
               
              SOLDIER
text:
It
               
              signs
               
              well
              ,
               
              does
               
              it
               
              not
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Peace
              ,
               
              I
               
              say
              .
               
              What
               
              should
               
              this
               
              mean
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              SOLDIER
text:
’Tis
               
              the
               
              god
               
              Hercules
              ,
               
              whom
               
              Antony
               
              loved
              ,

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Walk
              .
               
              Let’s
               
              see
               
              if
               
              other
               
              watchmen

speaker: ALL
text:
How
               
              now
              ?
               
              How
               
              now
              ?
               
              Do
               
              you
               
              hear
               
              this
              ?

speaker:
THIRD
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Do
               
              you
               
              hear
              ,
               
              masters
              ?
               
              Do
               
              you
               
              hear
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Follow
               
              the
               
              noise
               
              so
               
              far
               
              as
               
              we
               
              have
               
              quarter
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SOLDIER
text:
Let’s
               
              see
               
              how
               
              it
               
              will
               
              give
               
              off
              .
